name: Sniper Counter
description:
Haven’t yet you decided if you are up to this shooting challenge? If no then get Sniper Counter and start hunting down your target enemy in your killing range. Sniper Counter is free killing spree for all the shooting and killing lovers

Features:
- Smart AI
- HD 3D graphics
- Play anytime, anywhere
- Simple and smooth operation
- Best quality attractive sound effects
- a large number of advanced powerful weapons
- Radar vision positioning the enemy's position
- Challenges of increasing levels of difficulty
- Realistic 3D shooting battlefield environment
